flawed_nl_solution:
Her children ate 25% of the 16 brownies so they ate 0.25*16 = <<25*0.01*16=4>>4 slices
There were 16 brownies and the children ate 4 slices, leaving 16-4 = <<16-4=8>>8 brownies
The family ate 50% of the remaining 8 brownies so they ate 0.5*8 = <<50*0.01*8=4>>4 brownies
There were 8 brownies and they ate 4 which leaves 8-4 = <<8-4=4>>4 brownies
Lorraine had 1 more of the 4 remaining brownies which leaves 4-1 = <<4-1=3>>3 brownies
